checks.name: Connectivity
checks.note: Reliable API access with minor latency issues.

checks.name: Command & Tool Use
checks.note: Handles basic commands well but may struggle with complex multi-tool sequences.

checks.name: Cursor File Operations
checks.note: Effective for reading and editing files, though limited in handling very large files.

checks.name: Task Completeness
checks.note: Completes most tasks but requires clear instructions for edge cases.

checks.name: Compliance & Safety
checks.note: Adheres to guidelines but could improve in handling ambiguous ethical scenarios.

checks.name: Stability
checks.note: Consistent performance with no crashes observed.

summary: Grok-3-mini performs well as a lightweight contributor model, suitable for efficient, non-critical tasks.
